feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.03.24
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 781abaa feature: Entities in dropdowns #247 (#251) https://docs.olivetin.app/arg-dropdowns.html#args-dropdown-entities
  • 709223b feature: Removed unimplemented CSS rules from config, but added ID for buttons to allow for easy theming (#255)
  • 744debc feature: add apprise (#250) https://docs.olivetin.app/after-completion.html
  • 1319f31 Argument suggestions (#252) https://docs.olivetin.app/arg-suggestions.html

Bug fixes

  • a5a1c64 bugfix: Entity buttons didn't support popupOnStart
  • 8b49eef bugfix: Regex validation client side was not running (#254)
  • a8c4db1 bugfix: webui search order (#253)

Others

  • 19b4340 Merge branch 'main' of ssh://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin
  • 2b7bdff build(deps): bump follow-redirects in /integration-tests (#248)
  • a2df963 build(deps): bump github.com/docker/docker (#249)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.03.24

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.03.24

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.04.09
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 9104189 bugfix: dark mode headr (#261)
  • 3a8d870 bugfix: remove underline from sidebar links
  • 1b539df bugfix: rounded buttons for folders (#260)
  • f5794e5 bugfix: sidebar nav wont tab when hidden (#259)

Others

  • ce670cf Bug ignored signals (#257)
  • 7dd1d0a Markup optimisations (#258)
  • 1d446ac custom-webui and faster theme loading (#262)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.04.09

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.04.09

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.04.14
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 8341b1d feature: Huge JWT improvements for CloudFlare, etc (#269)
  • 43c48ae feature: Renamed authJwtSecret to authJwtHmacSecret (#271)
  • f60ab6c feature: Show username in header (#270)
  • 3de819a feature: add prometheus metrics (#268)

Bug fixes

  • dd11961 bugfix: custom-webui prefix

Others

  • 0b546ea Improve screenshots visibility
  • 558e181 doc: Updated mobile screenshot
  • 9d6afa2 doc: typo #266 (#267)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.04.14

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.04.14

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • feature: Renamed authJwtSecret to authJwtHmacSecret (https://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin/pull/271)

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!
